import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import styles from './Contact.module.css' import contPic from '../../images/6.jpg' export default function Contact() { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [success, setSuccess] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // send the message to the server try { await axios.post("/api/contact", { name, email, message, }); setSuccess(true); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } }; return ( <>
